titles.title: To require that the Librarian of Congress be appointed from among individuals with specialized training or significant experience in the field of library and information science.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Requires that the Librarian of Congress be appointed from among individuals who have specialized training or significant experience in the field of library and information science.
